review: This device is fantastic and has made me a cable quitter!  Straightforward, easy set up; just plug into your TV and download the Chromecast app to your phone or install in your Chrome browser.  The one complaint I have, which may be a result of my internet connection, is the quality from my Chrome browser to TV is pretty poor.  The quality when I use my iPad or iPhone is great.
author: Ser

review: Awesome product! I stream from my Windows, Ubuntu & Linux Chrome Browser Tabs, from our phones, iPad and the Nexus 7 - all seamlessly. Set up was a breeze and the connectivity is excellent. Not a single drop or problem so far. Great value for the money.
